metadata.title: CVE-2022-48913 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:blktrace: fix use after free for struct blk_traceWhen tracing the whole disk, 'dropped' and 'msg' will be createdunder 'q->debugfs_dir' and 'bt->dir' is NULL, thus blk_trace_free()won't remove those files. What's worse, the following UAF can betriggered because of accessing stale 'dropped' and 'msg':==================================================================BUG: KASAN: use-after-free in blk_dropped_read+0x89/0x100Read of size 4 at addr ffff88816912f3d8 by task blktrace/1188CPU: 27 PID: 1188 Comm: blktrace Not tainted 5.17.0-rc4-next-20220217+ #469Hardware name: QEMU Standard PC
